about_the_game:
Experience a taste of Kingdom Defense: Deliverance with this limited content demo. Defend your castle against relentless waves of orcs and villains in this immersive 2D game. Utilize unique defensive units and strategic gameplay to protect your stronghold and emerge victorious. This demo version includes a selection of levels, enemies, and abilities from the full game, giving you a preview of the epic battles and thrilling fantasy adventure.

Demo Key Features:

  • Dynamic Battle Mechanics: Engage in strategic, real-time gameplay with immersive battle mechanics.

  • Unique Defensive Units: Command a variety of heroes, warriors, and mystical creatures to fortify your defenses.

  • Limited Levels: Battle through a curated series of levels, each with its own unique enemies and obstacles.

  • Powerful Abilities: Equip your heroes with a selection of special abilities and unleash devastating powers to fend off the orc invasion.

  • Limited Enemies: Face a specific group of enemies that will test your strategic skills and determination.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Confront powerful bosses that will challenge your strategies and fortitude.

Full Version Key Features:

  • Expanded Battle Mechanics: Enjoy enhanced strategic gameplay with additional features and mechanics.

  • Diverse Defensive Units: Access a wider variety of heroes, warriors, and mystical creatures to build your ultimate defense team.

  • Extensive Levels: Explore a vast array of levels, each with unique challenges, enemies, and environments.

  • Enhanced Abilities: Unlock and upgrade a comprehensive set of special abilities for your heroes, providing even more tactical options.

  • Varied Enemies: Encounter a diverse range of enemies with different abilities and strategies.

  • Epic Boss Battles: Face even more powerful bosses with unique mechanics that will test your skills and determination.
